name: Rainy Perlin Noise
description: For this work, during the rainy days in Jönköping I got inspired by the raindrops getting bigger and smaller through following a trail on my window. I coded it as an experiment based on the Perlin Noise example from Garrit on Canvas.

name: Purple 'heatmap' Perlin Noise
description: This variation was inspired by complementary graphics of the 'Sour' album by Olivia Rodrigo. I coded it as an experiment based on the Perlin Noise example from Garrit on Canvas.

name: Van Gogh Sunflowers
description: For these flowers, I got inspired by the painting Sunflowers by Van Gogh but I focused solely on the flowers. I coded it as an experiment based on the flower example that we live coded with Bassima during a lecture.

name: Van Gogh Sunflowers Movement
description: For these flowers, I got inspired by the painting Sunflowers by Van Gogh, but also focused on distorted forms which were a main characteristic of the Post-Impressionist movement that the artist was a part of. I coded it as an experiment based on the flower example that we live coded with Bassima during a lecture and used help from the p5 referencing for the movement.

name: Van Gogh Sunflowers Reimagined through Generative Art
description: For this work, I got inspired by the painting Sunflowers by Van Gogh and built upon the initial flower experiment, adding stems, a vase, and more details such as additional petals, table, etc. I coded it as an experiment based on the flower example that we live coded with Bassima during a lecture.

name: Flow Field 'Matrix'
description: For this work, tried creating a flow field with randomly coloured rectangled. I based the code on the flow field example, experimenting with the numbers until I reached a result which satisfied my vision.

name: Flow Field number Matrix
description: For this work, I built upon the 'Matrix' experiment, creating an actual number matrix. '
